channel.title: Robot Air Attack Squadron Bound for Iraq
channel.description:
http://apnews.myway.com/article/20070715/D8QD61V80.html
It's another sign that the Air Force is planning for an extended stay in Iraq, supporting Iraqi government forces in any continuing conflict, even if U.S. ground troops are drawn down in the coming years.
The real question is, why didn't the US government coordinate this with the release of Transformers?

item.title: Robot Air Attack Squadron Bound for Iraq
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

edit - it actually sucks… what is the point in spending millions on training fit pilots when all they do is sit there and become fat and play it like a video game

Read full topic
item.source: Robot Air Attack Squadron Bound for Iraq
